content: Anyone able to help with this PHP question in the forum? https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/using-php-user-pages Not sure I know the best solution...

BWPanda said:

Not sure I know the best solution...

Neither am I, but I tried...

That forum question turned out to be about "read and display exif data". If anyone has an idea, please post there... My only idea would be to port the Drupal module - which looks like a monster code-wise.
